hr.fer.zemris.java.hw11.notepadpp.local.swing

Class FormLocalizationProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.java.hw11.notepadpp.local.AbstractLocalizationProvider
      • hr.fer.zemris.java.hw11.notepadpp.local.LocalizationProviderBridge
        • hr.fer.zemris.java.hw11.notepadpp.local.swing.FormLocalizationProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILocalizationListener, ILocalizationProvider, java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class FormLocalizationProvider
extends LocalizationProviderBridge
implements java.awt.event.WindowListener
    Class used to connect the localization provider bridge to the localization provider when the frame is created and to disconnect it when the frame is closed.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    MarkoB

    • Constructor Detail

      • FormLocalizationProvider

        public FormLocalizationProvider(LocalizationProvider provider,
                        javax.swing.JFrame frame)
        Class constructor. Constructor takes 2 arguments, the reference to the localization provider and the reference to the frame it's listening on.
        Parameters:
        provider - the reference to the localization provider
        frame - the reference to the frame the FormLocalizationProvider is listening on
